name: Tide Tactics

branding_data.short_description: Tide Tactics is an aquatic-themed turn-based tactical combat game, focusing on ethical and sustainable oceanic warfare.
branding_data.detailed_description: Tide Tactics immerses players in a vibrant underwater world where they command a team of creatures adapted for oceanic combat. The gameplay spans different oceanic sections, transitioning seamlessly between coral reefs, deep-sea trenches, and vibrant river estuaries. As players plot their turn-based strategies, they must consider the environmental impact of their actions, aiming to maintain the delicate balance of these aquatic ecosystems. Ethical choices and sustainable tactics play a pivotal role, as players engage in combat scenarios that challenge them to protect marine life and ensure the health of their surroundings. The game encourages thoughtful decision-making, promoting the importance of conservation and mindful gaming tactics in an engaging and accessible format suitable for developers of all skills levels.
